aircraft.value: Condor Tactical - AC-7151-631 at Forward Operating Base-3

defect_observed.value: Pressure regulator drift. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pneumatic Starter component. Inspection revealed damage to critical components.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 25/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 28/09/2024 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 29/09/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 30/09/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 30/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Pressure regulator drift. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Vibration induced loosening of mechanical fasteners
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Pneumatic Starter component. Inspection
revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

ii. Preventive Action: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage
